FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Combat Training

  1. If Dreadwing is equipped with Combat Training and 2 weapons and/or armors, does Combat Training give Dreadwing bold/tough 2 since he has 2 weapons/armors? Same question can be asked for Predaking; Does he get Bold 5 if he has 5 weapons and combat training? [Source: WotC]
    No. A single Combat Training gives Bold/Tough 1 at most.
